item.title: 巴基斯坦寻求出售国家航空公司多数股权的竞标
item.description: 巴基斯坦正在寻求出售巴基斯坦国际航空公司多数股权的投标，目标是在两个月内完成这家近二十年来一直未能盈利的国有航空公司的交易。【原文：Pakistan is seeking bids to sell a majority stake in Pakistan International Airlines, with the aim to complete the deal in two months for the state-owned carrier that has failed to make a profit in almost two decades.】

item.title: 苹果在经历十年来最糟糕的一季度后与支撑位徘徊
item.description: 苹果公司的股价刚刚创下十多年来相对于 S&P 500 指数最差的一个季度，交易员们正在寻找最坏的情况可能已经过去的迹象。【原文：With Apple Inc.’s stock coming off its worst quarter relative to the S&P 500 Index in over a decade, traders are looking for signs that the worst may be over.】

item.title: 经济学家称，瑞士联合银行无视全球惯例，提拔内部人士
item.description: 据一组经济学家称，瑞士国家银行的任命与全球同行背道而驰，因为政府一直在提拔内部人士。【原文：Swiss National Bank appointments go against the grain of global peers because the government keeps promoting insiders, according to a group of economists.】

item.title: 警告 2022 年将干预日元的前官员发出新警报
item.description: 日本前货币局局长表示，考虑到主要官员发出的高度警告，日本已做好准备，一旦日元疲软超出当前范围，将随时干预货币市场。【原文：Japan is ready to intervene in the currency market at any time should the yen weaken beyond its current range, given the extent of heightened warnings from key officials, according to the nation’s former currency chief.】

item.title: 摩根大通策略师警告股市忽视后期降息
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A widening gap between equity markets and interest-rate expectations is a worrying sign, according to strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 英国抵押贷款批准量激增，显示住房市场走强
item.description: 英国贷款机构为 17 个月来最多的抵押贷款开了绿灯，这表明尽管上个月房价略有下跌，但房地产市场的势头仍在增长。【原文：UK lenders gave the green light to the most mortgages in 17 months, an indication of growing momentum in the property market despite a small dip in prices last month.】

item.title: 绿芽未能提振情绪，人民币面临越来越大的压力
item.description: 人民币距离其在岸交易区间的弱势一端仅有一线之隔，这是近期一系列乐观的经济数据不足以支撑人民币的最新迹象。【原文：The yuan is a whisker away from the weak end of its onshore trading band, the latest sign that a recent slew of upbeat economic data hasn’t been enough to bolster the Chinese currency.】

item.title: 随着旅游业回暖，菲律宾航空公司计划投入 4.5 亿美元
item.description: 菲律宾航空公司（Philippine Airlines Inc.【原文：Philippine Airlines Inc. has set a spending budget of $450 million for this year, more than double the $170 million allotted in 2023, as it gears up for the continued recovery in tourism as well as tighter competition.】

item.title: 物流困境开始缓解，南非制造商情绪高涨
item.description: 3 月份，南非制造商的信心有所下降，但衡量交付情况的子集出现了显著变化，这表明该国受阻的物流状况可能开始好转。【原文：South African manufacturers’ sentiment dipped in March but a significant shift in a subset gauging deliveries signaled that the country’s snarled logistics may be starting to improve.】

item.title: 俄罗斯索科尔原油不顾美国制裁重返印度市场
item.description: 三艘运输俄罗斯索科尔（Sokol）货物的油轮停靠在印度港口附近，这表明尽管美国更严厉的制裁造成了一些麻烦，但这种原油贸易正在恢复。【原文：Three tankers hauling Russian Sokol cargoes are anchored near Indian ports, indicating trade of the crude grade is returning despite complications caused by tougher US sanctions.】

item.title: 瑞典央行请求 41 亿美元弥补债券损失
item.description: 瑞典中央银行在低通胀时期积累的债券出现巨额亏损后，要求立法者恢复其权益。【原文：Sweden’s Riksbank asked lawmakers to restore its equity after the central bank posted large losses on bonds amassed during a period of low inflation.】

item.title: 市场趋紧，石油价格自 10 月以来首次触及 85 美元
item.description: 美国原油期货在纽约触及每桶 85 美元，这是自 10 月份以来的首次，因为欧佩克+削减供应支撑着市场稳步走强。【原文：US crude futures hit $85 a barrel in New York for the first time since October, as OPEC+ supply cuts underpin a steadily strengthening market.】

item.title: 俄罗斯液化天然气扩张计划因美国制裁推迟出口而面临风险
item.description: 俄罗斯迅速扩大液化天然气出口的计划由于美国的制裁而停滞不前，美国的制裁推迟了一个大型新项目的运输。【原文：Russia’s plan to rapidly expand liquefied natural gas exports is stalling due to US sanctions that are delaying shipments from a major new project.】

item.title: 阿贾克斯足球俱乐部因内幕交易指控解雇首席执行官
item.description: 阿贾克斯俱乐部（AFC Ajax NV）暂停其首席执行官亚历克斯-克罗斯（Alex Kroes）的职务，并表示在 "强烈迹象 "表明其涉嫌内幕交易后，计划将其解职。【原文：AFC Ajax NV suspended its Chief Executive Officer Alex Kroes and said it plans to dismiss him after “strong indications” of insider trading.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数一年来首次创收盘纪录新高
item.description: 受国防相关股票以及对利率可能降低的广泛乐观情绪提振，英国蓝筹股指数周二的收盘价将创下历史新高。【原文：The UK’s blue-chip stock index was set to close at an all-time high on Tuesday, boosted by defense-related stocks as well as broader optimism about potentially lower interest rates.】

item.title: Redx 将退出伦敦证券交易所 AIM，理由是流动性低
item.description: 生物技术公司 Redx Pharma Plc 将从伦敦证券交易所最小的市场撤出其股票，理由是流动性受到限制，并表示作为一家私营公司将更容易吸引投资者。【原文：Biotech company Redx Pharma Plc is set to pull its shares from the London Stock Exchange’s smallest market, citing liquidity constraints and saying it will attract investors more easily as a private company.】

item.title: 英国能否取消代价高昂的养老金 "三重锁定"？
item.description: 英国的养老金 "三重锁 "规定，政府承诺每年至少增加一次退休金。这项政策给紧张的公共财政带来了日益沉重的负担，在英国准备今年晚些时候举行大选之际，它成为了激烈讨论的话题。执政的保守党承诺维持这一政策。虽然工党反对派也表示支持三重锁定，但取消该政策可以腾出资金用于其他紧急优先支出项目【原文：The UK’s pension “triple lock” commits the government to providing minimum yearly increases in retirement payouts. The policy is placing a growing burden on strained public finances, making it the subject of intense debate as the country prepares for a general election later in the year. The governing Conservatives have committed to maintaining it. While the Labour opposition has also voiced support for the triple lock, doing away with it could free up money for other urgent spending priorities】

item.title: 欧洲央行称 2 月份消费者通胀预期下降
item.description: 购物者走在柏林的街道上。摄影师：Krisztian Bocsi/Bloomberg【原文：Shoppers walk along a street in Berlin. Photographer: Krisztian Bocsi/Bloomberg】

item.title: 极端高温导致菲律宾学校关闭，只能远程上课
item.description: 菲律宾周二暂停了全国部分城市的面授课程，因为气温升高促使政府重启远程教育。【原文：The Philippines suspended in-person classes in some cities across the country on Tuesday as rising temperatures prompted the government to revive remote learning alternatives.】

item.title: 中国最大银行将为旅游业提供 410 亿美元融资
item.description: 在世界第二大经济体消费支出低迷的情况下，中国工商银行将提供 3,000 亿元人民币（合 410 亿美元）的融资，以促进中国旅游业的发展。【原文：The Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd. will offer 300-billion yuan ($41 billion) in financing to boost the nation’s tourism sector amid sluggish consumer spending in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 世界银行称巴基斯坦未来两年经济增长率将低于 3
item.description: 根据世界银行的最新估计，巴基斯坦的经济增长预计将从本财政年度开始回升，但在未来两年内仍将低于 3%。【原文：Pakistan’s economic growth is expected to pick up from the current fiscal year but remain below 3% for the next two years, according to the latest estimates from the World Bank.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商在缓慢起步后三月表现强劲
item.description: 由于季节性假期的影响，中国的电动汽车制造商在经历了年初的低迷之后，3 月份的销售表现强劲，其中几家公司的销售增幅达到两位数。【原文：March is shaping up as a strong month for China’s electric vehicle makers with several reporting double digit sales gains after a slow start to the year due to seasonal holidays.】

item.title: 欧洲股市节后上涨，矿商和能源股领涨
item.description: 欧洲股市在假期后恢复交易，矿业股和能源股领涨。投资者关注周一美国制造业数据公布后的利率走势。【原文：European equities rose as trading resumed following a holiday, with gains led by miners and energy stocks. Investors were focused on the path of interest rates after US manufacturing data on Monday.】

item.title: 日本另类资产投资者跃升 50%，追求收益率
item.description: 根据市场数据提供商 Preqin Ltd. 的一份报告，日本投资者近年来越来越多地涌入另类资产领域，随着他们寻求收益，这一趋势可能会继续下去。【原文：Japanese investors have been increasingly piling into alternative assets in recent years, and the trend is likely to continue as they search for yield, according to a report from market data provider Preqin Ltd.】

item.title: 印度炙热的热浪促使印度央行暂缓降息
item.description: 经济学家们表示，印度大部分地区出现的炙热热浪将引发印度决策者们的担忧，他们已经在努力解决通胀率居高不下的问题，降息时机有可能被推迟。【原文：A sizzling heat wave in large parts of the country will raise concerns for India’s policymakers already grappling with sticky inflation, potentially pushing back the timing for interest rate cuts, economists said.】

item.title: 伊朗称已就以色列对伊朗大院的致命袭击向美国发出信息
item.description: 伊朗最高外交官称，德黑兰就美国指责以色列对其驻大马士革领事馆发动致命袭击一事向美国发出了 "重要信息"。【原文：Iran’s top diplomat said Tehran sent the US an “important message” over a deadly attack it has blamed on Israel on its consulate compound in Damascus.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: Vistara 因机组人员短缺而取消航班
item.description: 塔塔集团和新加坡航空公司共同拥有的印度维斯塔拉航空公司（Vistara）因机组人员短缺而取消了大量航班。【原文：Indian airline Vistara, co-owned by Tata Group and Singapore Airlines Ltd., has canceled a raft of flights as it struggles with a crew shortage.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国房价七个月来首次下滑
item.description: 伦敦城。摄影师：Mike Kemp/Getty Images【原文：The City of London. Photographer: Mike Kemp/Getty Images】

item.title: 美联储的 "更长更高的耶稣受难日
item.description:
鲍威尔明确表示他不急于降息，市场相信他的话，在经济如此强劲的情况下，这并不是坏事

。【原文：

Powell makes it clear he’s in no rush to cut rates, markets believe him, and that’s not bad with an economy this strong

】
